entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
